metadata.title: CVE-2018-21245 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Pound before 2.8 allows HTTP request smuggling, a related issue toCVE-2016-10711.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-21245` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pound - 2.6-6.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pound package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6-6.1ubuntu0.1').
